headline.main: U.S. Judge Weighs Fate of Afghan Family Detained in California
headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Weighs Fate of Afghan Family Detained in California

lead_paragraph: A federal judge was due on Monday to consider a petition seeking the immediate release of an Afghan family of five said by their lawyers to have been detained by U.S. agents upon their arrival in California, despite having valid visas to enter the country.
